meanings.definition: Disagreements or disputes among a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The dissensions within the team were causing a lot of problems.
meanings.sent2: The dissensions between the students were finally resolved through mediation.
meanings.sent3: The dissensions over who gets to use the swing first led to a funny argument.
meanings.sent4: The dissensions in the family were like storm clouds gathering on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The dissensions at the meeting were so intense, you could feel the tension in the air.

meanings.definition: A conflict or quarrel between individuals or factions.
meanings.sent1: The dissensions between the two neighbors escalated quickly.
meanings.sent2: The dissensions among the political parties were becoming more pronounced.
meanings.sent3: The dissensions over the last piece of cake turned into a playful food fight.
meanings.sent4: The dissensions in the courtroom were like thunder before the storm of arguments.
meanings.sent5: The dissensions in the office were like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
